title: Help, my friend didn't lock in
body: My friend, that I was queuing in dynamic with failed to lock in a champion after we waited for an hour, I want to report him. Please help me!

replies.body: It sucks that you waited so long only to miss the match, but he already gets a queue dodge penalty for that, and unless he does this a *lot* Riot isn't going to punish him further. The boards are not the place for reporting players, so if you need to report someone in the future for an actual offense please use a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where it's private.
Thanks DTN, I'll keep that in mind!
